thread.title: Paul Ryan is headed towards doom
thread.title_full: Paul Ryan is headed towards doom - The Washington Post

author: John Woodrow Cox
title: Paul Ryan is headed towards doom
text:
Rep. Paul Ryan, R-Wis. ) (Carolyn Kaster/AP) By Eugene Robinson Opinion writer October 22 at 8:35 PM Follow @Eugene_Robinson Aweek ago, Paul Ryan looked doomed. Now, he looks really, truly doomed.
The Wisconsin Republican, who achieved national prominence as Mitt Romney’s running mate in 2012, seems more likely than ever to become the next speaker of the House. A devout man of faith , he will need your prayers.
Eugene Robinson writes a twice-a-week column on politics and culture, contributes to the PostPartisan blog, and hosts a weekly online chat with readers. In a three-decade career at The Post, Robinson has been city hall reporter, city editor, foreign correspondent in Buenos Aires and London, foreign editor, and assistant managing editor in charge of the paper’s Style section. View Archive Facebook RSS When incumbent John A. Boehner (R-Ohio) announced his resignation, Ryan made clear he did not want the job . Who on earth would? Boehner spent his tenure trying — and failing — to corral ultra-conservative Republicans into a working majority.
